availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Served in the 3rd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 2nd Lieutenant from October 8, 1861 to. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Lieutenant Colonel from.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 592.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 171.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #640935, Certificate #420435.
Find A Grave, "Gen Daniel Ray Collier (Nov 21, 1840-Jan 23, 1904)," Memorial #84855059, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84855059 (accessed August 6, 2020).
